step=0, rand=0, actions=<> Want | Got ✗ --------------- ...O.. | ...... .IIII. | .IIII. ...... | ...... ...... | ......
step=1, rand=0, actions=<RotateRight> Want | Got ✗ --------------- ...O.. | ...I.. .IIII. | ...I.. ...... | ...I.. ...... | ...I..
step=2, rand=0, actions=<Left> Want | Got ✗ -------------------------- ...O.. | GameOverDisplay() IIII.. | ...... | ...... |
